flawed_nl_solution:
On the first day, Cleo and Ignacio took 3/5 * 30 marbles = <<3/5*30=150/3>>150/3 marbles from the jar
When they shared the marbles, each got 150/3 marbles / 2 people = <<150/3/2=25>>25 marbles/person
The total number of marbles remaining in the jar is 30 marbles - 150/3 marbles = <<30-150/3=-20>>-20 marbles
On the third day, Cleo took 1/2 * -20 marbles = <<1/2*-20=-10>>-10 marbles from the jar.
The total number of marbles she has on the third day is -10 marbles + 25 marbles = <<-10+25=15>>15 marbles.
#### 15

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 150/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
